text: Apane dina de agu tom bina kise hora da visavasa na karo. Paratu sirafa usa da (visavasa karom) jihare tuhade dharama upara cale. Kahom, caga maraga uha hi hai jihara alaha dikha'e ate iha sabha kujha usa di dena hai ki kise nu uha dita jave jo kujha tuhanu dita gi'a si kite uha tuhade raba de age tuhade bare vica galata phahimi ka'ima kara dena. Kahom, vadi'a'i alaha de hatha vica hai. Uha jisanu cahuda hai dida hai. Alaha bara vi'apakata vala ate gi'ana vala hai
